$$._: Internet has become an important way of collecting intelligence for its richness of resources and timeliness. Based on the features of collection and retrieval of public intelligence, an intelligence collection system using knowledge base and user interest model is developed. The system can automatically collect intelligence according to authoritative websites or designated websites, create index after information processing including word segmentation, information filter and conversion, and realize full-text retrieval. The system large scale enhances the timeliness and accuracy of intelligence collection.
